name: repair_portal_app
observations: Frappe v15 custom app for clarinet repair management

Contains multiple modules: customer, enhancements, inspection, instrument_profile, instrument_setup, intake, inventory, lab, player_profile, qa, repair, repair_logging, repair_portal, repair_portal_settings, service_planning, stock, tools, trade_shows
Has duplicate/misplaced DocTypes that need reorganization
repair_portal module contains mixed/central DocTypes that should be distributed to proper modules
Fixed CRITICAL: eval() vulnerability in utils/error_handler.py
Fixed MEDIUM: explicit db.commit() removed from api/frontend/player_profile.py
Fixed MEDIUM: added input validation to api/frontend/customer_profile.py
All 12+ report files verified using parameterized queries
Enterprise error handler at utils/error_handler.py with safe pattern matching
Security audit report created at docs/SECURITY_AUDIT_REPORT.md
